pkgmetadata.longdescription: Nonparametric Tests via Permutations // Robust permutation tests for location, correlation, and regression problems, as described in Helwig (2019a) doi:10.1002/wics.1457 and Helwig (2019b) doi:10.1016/j.neuroimage.2019.116030. Univariate and multivariate tests are supported. For each problem, exact tests and Monte Carlo approximations are available. Parallel computing is implemented via the 'parallel' package.
